overview: Eddie Bravo Invitational 12: The Female Flyweights was a grappling event held on July 30, 2017 at The Orpheum Theatre in Los Angeles, California. The event consisted of a submission-only tournament of 16 female flyweight (125 lb) contenders as well as a combat jiu-jitsu tournament of 4 contenders, also female flyweights.
title: Eddie Bravo Invitational 12
